name: Shrimp Mac and Cheese
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This macaroni and cheese takes on a subtle coastal flair with the addition of shrimp. I used cooked salad shrimp as I found the size comparable to the elbow macaroni.
ingredients: ½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pour 5 cups water into a saucepan
Cover and bring to a boil over high heat
Add macaroni and boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in flour until a smooth paste is formed
Slowly pour in milk, stirring to incorporate
Add 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, sour cream, and Cajun seasoning
Drain macaroni and stir into the sauce
Add frozen shrimp and stir to combine
Pour macaroni mixture into an oval au gratin dish
Top with panko bread crumbs and 2 tablespoons Cheddar cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and golden, about 20 minutes
